channel.title: Quick, simple question - Please read
channel.description: Can somebody tell me how to make a shop admin and mod only?

[quote=“maxxy2, post:6, topic:286464”]} else if (NPCID == 1199 && playerRights >= 1) {
// Magic store owner shop -bakatool
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 45; // Client shop Owner

he mixed around the > & = sign. try it with what i did.[/quote]

Ok thanks for that, it seems to still be not working. Can you check this code for me

} else if (NPCID == 461) { // Magic store owner shop -bakatool PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 39; // Magic store owner shop } else if (NPCID == 567) { // Magic store owner shop -bakatool PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; // Client shop Owner } else if (NPCID == 1199 && playerRights >= 1) { // Magic store owner shop -bakatool PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 45; // Client shop Owner } else if (NPCID == 553) { // Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; // Aubury Magic Shop

Im going for something to eat so i will be back soon

item.title: Quick, simple question - Please read
item.dc:creator: @leylo leylo
item.description:
@leylo wrote:

Ok thanks alot, can you tell me where to place this?

Im a real noob coder lol[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2009, 10:20:13 am[/size][hr]Ok i found it in my client.java.

I want to put it on “client shop”

How can i do this?

} else if (NPCID == 567) { // Magic store owner shop -bakatool PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; // Client shop Owner } else if (NPCID == 1199) { // Magic store owner shop -bakatool PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 45; // Client shop Owner } else if (NPCID == 553) { // Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; // Aubury Magic Shop } else if ((NPCID == 522) || (NPCID == 523)) { // Shop Keeper + Assistant PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; // Varrock General Store
